# tools

The Tools module for LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/index" symbolName="ContextTool" /> ContextTool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/index" symbolName="ContextToolDef" /> ContextToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.
